basicInfo.name: Rakan Douli
basicInfo.title: Technical Project Lead / Business Operations Specialist
basicInfo.summary: Versatile professional with a Bachelor of Business Administration and over 10 years of international experience bridging the gap between business strategy and technical execution. Expert in architecting complex digital platforms, managing high-value accounts, and leading project workstreams from concept to launch. Proven track record in Sales (Toshiba Best Sales Award) and technical systems design. Multilingual (Arabic, English, Dutch) and highly adept at managing stakeholders in international environments.

items.title: Technical Project Lead
details: Architected and led the development of an enterprise-grade Arabic marketplace platform, managing a complex structure of 40+ database entities.
Directed the creation of 12 custom admin dashboards with advanced RBAC permissions and AI-driven moderation tools.
Designed and implemented complex business logic for professional advertising systems and subscription billing flows.
Coordinated multi-environment infrastructure strategy using Docker, Hetzner, and Vercel to ensure 24/7 platform availability.
Managed end-to-end technical requirements, from initial database design to real-time communication systems.

items.title: Project Solutions Consultant
details: Consulted with diverse clients to translate business requirements into functional digital platforms and voting systems.
Managed end-to-end project delivery, including requirements gathering, performance optimization, and digital strategy.
Developed custom client-facing solutions with a focus on high user engagement and SEO performance.

items.title: Technical Specialist
details: Optimized internal management applications to streamline business operations and improve cross-departmental data flow.
Managed the implementation of new features for internal tools, enhancing user experience and operational efficiency.
Resolved critical system bugs and improved the functionality of decoupled commerce components.

items.title: Systems Developer
details: Engineered high-performance data gateway solutions, resulting in a 30% reduction in system load times.
Led performance analysis and load testing to optimize resource efficiency for multiple web applications.
Collaborated on improving decoupled data flows to enhance system scalability for enterprise clients.

items.title: Digital Solutions Specialist
details: Managed content integration and digital performance for high-profile clients including Burger King and Vodafone.
Led A/B testing initiatives to drive significant improvements in customer engagement and conversion rates.
Designed and optimized digital communication templates to enhance customer communication effectiveness.

items.title: Sales Specialist
details: Exceeded sales targets through persuasive communication and high-quality customer service in a fast-paced environment.

items.title: Graphic Designer & Translator
details: Produced high-impact visual marketing materials and managed international social media presence.
Provided professional translation services to bridge communication gaps for international clients.

items.title: Logistics Coordinator
details: Oversaw logistics operations and export management, ensuring timely delivery and supply chain efficiency.

items.title: Account Manager
details: Managed a portfolio of 50+ key accounts, resolving invoicing and payment issues while maintaining strong client relations.
Optimized inventory management using specialized software, increasing departmental productivity by 50%.
Produced comprehensive monthly sales and analytical reports for regional management.

items.title: Business Representative (Sales)
details: Managed division inventory and sales strategy, leading to recognition as the region's 'Best Sales Promoter'.
Provided expert product knowledge to drive business growth and customer satisfaction.

items.title: Cloud & Data Management Training Program – ITMG / ESF
